body_html:
My understanding is that @fnl is saying that if TensorContractionThreadPool.h is copied from eigen3 into third_party/eigen3/ then the build succeeds. To me, this seems an indication that the path to reach it is incorrect.

Or, are you saying that we shouldn't have to ship a modified FixedPoint header at all?
body_text:
My understanding is that @fnl is saying that if TensorContractionThreadPool.h is copied from eigen3 into third_party/eigen3/ then the build succeeds. To me, this seems an indication that the path to reach it is incorrect.
Or, are you saying that we shouldn't have to ship a modified FixedPoint header at all?
body:
My understanding is that @fnl is saying that if TensorContractionThreadPool.h is copied from eigen3 into third_party/eigen3/ then the build succeeds. To me, this seems an indication that the path to reach it is incorrect.

Or, are you saying that we shouldn't have to ship a modified FixedPoint header at all?
